page.title: 12A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I am a pupil of Langham School and I live at Ashwell,one of the 6 feeder villages.I am 9 and have a bedroom of my own.I wake up at 6.15am and for breakfast have cereals,tea and an egg. Then I wash and clean my teeth.After breakfast Dad and I walk our dog.Later I go on my bicycle to the village shop for the papers.I bring them to Dad and then get ready for school.The bus comes at 8.45am and school starts at 9.15am.After registration we go to assembly.Then it'S lessons and break at 10.40am until 10.55am.We go to lunch at 12.15pm,but I bring sandwiches.We play until 1.30pm.Then come in and work until 2.45pm,have another play and work until 3.45pm.After school on Friday I go to athletics then go home,have my tea and go out to play again.Later it's supper then bed.
